# Sample Spec Tasks

## Tasks

- [x] 1. Completed task
  - This task is already done
  - _Requirements: 1.1_

- [~] 2. In progress task
  - [ ] 2.1 First subtask
    - Subtask description
    - _Requirements: 2.1_
  - [x] 2.2 Completed subtask
    - _Requirements: 2.2_
  - [ ]* 2.3 Optional subtask
    - This is optional
    - _Requirements: 2.3_

- [ ] 3. Pending task with dependencies
  - Task that depends on task 2
  - _Requirements: 3.1, 3.2_

- [ ] 4. Simple pending task
  - No subtasks
  - _Requirements: 4.1_
